name: Choco Pixel S (itch)
description:
Choco Pixel S is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space avoiding traps and choosing the right directions to avoid dead ends.

In Choco Pixel S:

- Traps
- Chocolate
- Sweets
- Cool music
- 50 levels
- Pixel art
